name: Mansfield's Manor
blurb: Mansfield's Manor is a 3d adventure puzzle game that will leave you jumping at sounds and wondering what lies behind the next corner.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Your name will be added to a special "Thank You" page on the Fat Cat Studios website.
A personalized E-card sent to you with thanks from the entire Mansfield Staff in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
A digital copy of the sound track used in the final version of Mansfield's Manor in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
A full digital copy of Mansfield's Manor in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
An official Mansfield's Manor poster to hang proudly in your home in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
A physical copy of Mansfield's Manor in addition to the digital one, complete with cover art, plus all lower tiered rewards.

You will get the choice of either an official Mansfield's Manor inscribed shot glass or coffee mug in addition to all lower tiered rewards.  Please note, the shot glass is intended as a collectors item only.
Access to all the beta versions of Mansfield's Manor and your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits in addition to all lower tiered rewards.

The first 10 people of this tier will get their name on a tombstone in the Mansfield's Manor graveyard and a choice of 2 official Mansfield's Manor inscribed items: shot glass, coffee mug, or travel mug. This is in addition to all lower tiered rewards except the 75 dollar pledge.  Please note, the shot glass is intended as a collectors item only.
An official Mansfield's Manor T-shirt in addition to all lower tiered rewards.

We will ask the first 20 backers to come up with a puzzle for Mansfield's Manor and if we can we will put it into the game.  If the puzzle can not be put in the game due to design constraints, you will be notified immediately so we can work together on redesigning it. In addition you will get a personalized surprise item from the game and all lower tiered rewards.

A choice of 3 items. At this point you can choose from a shot glass, a coffee mug, a travel mug, or a wine glass. This is in addition to all lower tiered rewards excluding the $75 reward and $150 item reward.  Please note, the shot glass and wine glass is intended as a collectors item only.
If you are a pet owner you'll love this, we will put a picture of your pet in a special area of Mansfield's Manor with your pet's name in gold underneath in addition to all lower tiered rewards.

You get a choice of four items from the official Mansfield's Manor items: the shot glass, coffee mug, travel mug, and the wine glass. We will also put a portrait of you, or a loved one, in Mansfield's Manor with a gold nameplate underneath in addition to all lower tiered rewards with the exception of the $75, $150 item, and $250 reward.  Please note, the shot glass and wine glass is intended as a collectors item only.

A copy of our "Adventurers Diary" which is a story of the game. Plus we will upgrade your tombstone from the lower prize to include an epitaph of your own choosing. This is in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
A digital book with all the puzzles in the game, including the puzzles designed by the backers in addition to all lower tiered rewards.

Our digital "Design Diary" which includes the fun and frustrations experienced in the making of Mansfield's Manor. From concept art to written reviews you will have the behind the scenes look at our game design process. This too is in addition to all lower tiered rewards.
We will put you as the hero, literally. The sounds and text in the game will be made to address you personally. This is also in addition to all lower tiered rewards.

Digital copies of the 2 planned sequels for Mansfield's Manor. These games will also be Kickstarted when the projects are ready, but this pledge will guarantee that you will receive copies of them both when they hit the market. And don't worry you still get all the lower tiered rewards.. Actual delivery time on this prize is to be announced.

A special in game building in Mansfield's Manor, a mausoleum with your family name on the outside and up to 8 names on the inside. The materials of the mausoleum will be determined by you from a given list.  It is truly a monument worthy of your contribution. And you still get all the lower tiered rewards.
